staxel.village.character.dialogue.RowanB: (안함)When I was young, there was a classy establishment on the outskirts of town.
(안함)I think it's what first got us thinking about building our own...
(안함)There really is nothing quite as refreshing as ^c:d03e37;coffee^c:pop;.
(안함)It wakes you right up, almost like you've been completely reborn.
(안함)You want to know my brother's secret ^c:d03e37;coffee^c:pop; recipe?
(안함)I'm afraid I can't tell you that.
